install.name: WolfSlider 1.0
install.author: celticwolf.com
install.description: WolfSlider Displays any module in a slider - submit bugs at www.celticwolf.com

param.name: slides_z_index
param.label: z-index of slides
param.description: Z-index of the slides. Controls whether they will appear over, under or on the same level as other elements on the page.

param.name: slide_buttons_z_index
param.label: z-index of slide buttons
param.description: Z-index of the playback control buttons. Controls whether they will appear over, under or on the same level as other elements on the page.

param.name: wolfslider_pos
param.label: Use modules in this position as slides
param.description: Name of position assigned to modules for slideshow

param.name: show_playback_buttons
param.label: Show playback buttons?
param.description: Show the play, pause, previous and next buttons to allow the user to control playback.

param.name: wolfslider_effect
param.label: Effect
param.description: Choose the effect to be used when transitioning between slides

param.name: use_slide_picker
param.label: Use a slide picker?
param.description: Use a series of numbers or links to directly go to specific slides

param.name: slide_picker_pos
param.label: Use module in this position as slide picker
param.description: Name of position assigned to module that contains slide picker

param.name: slide_picker_selector
param.label: CSS selector for picker elements
param.description: CSS selector that identifies the element whose children will be used to pick individual slides

param.default: Load Mootools 1.2 from Wolf Slider directory?
